Source.Name: gstreamer-editing-services
Source.Description: The "GStreamer Editing Services" is a library to simplify the creation of multimedia editing applications. Based on the GStreamer multimedia framework and the GNonLin set of plugins, its goals are to suit all types of editing-related applications.

Package.Name: gstreamer-editing-services
Package.Description: The "GStreamer Editing Services" is a library to simplify the creation of multimedia editing applications. Based on the GStreamer multimedia framework and the GNonLin set of plugins, its goals are to suit all types of editing-related applications.
